message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make you a one-time offer of $1,200,000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you, and I'm willing to negotiate further if you're interested. However, if you decline, I'll need to move on to another buyer who is willing to pay the full $1,000,000.
